definition: having the deep slightly brownish color of gold
details:
adjective
- having the deep slightly brownish color of gold
= synonyms: gilt, gold, aureate, golden
- made from or covered with gold
= synonyms: golden
- rich and superior in quality
= synonyms: grand, deluxe, luxurious, princely, opulent, sumptuous
- based on pretense
= synonyms: meretricious, specious
